//Author's Solution

#include<cstdio>
long long int pr[5000008],h[1000010]={0},k;
void generate_primes()
{
        int i,j,f,n;
        pr[0]=2;h[2]=1;
        k=1;
        for(i=3;i<=1000005;i+=2)
        {
            f=0;
            for(j=0;pr[j]*pr[j]<=i;j++)
            {
            
                if(i%pr[j]==0)
                {   f=1;
                    break;
                } 
                
            }
            if(f==0)
            {
                pr[k++]=i;
                h[i]=1;
            }
        }
       // printf("%d\n",k);
}
int main()
{
	generate_primes();
//	FILE *f1=freopen("in8.txt","r",stdin);
//	FILE *f2=freopen("out8.txt","w",stdout);
	long long int l,b,t;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&l,&b);
		//	printf("%lld %lld \n",l,b);
	
		if(l==2||l==3)
		l=1;
		if(b==2||b==3)
		b=1;
		if(h[l]==1)
		l--;
		if(h[b]==1)
		b--;
		//printf("%lld %lld \n",l,b);
		long long a=l*b;
		printf("%lld\n",a);
	}
//	fclose(f1);
//	fclose(f2);
	return 0;
}
